headline: Comcast to Participate in Morgan Stanley Investor Conference
summary: PHILADELPHIA, February 25, 2026--Comcast Corporation (Nasdaq: CMCSA) announced that on Tuesday, March 3, 2026, Mike Cavanagh, Co-CEO of Comcast Corporation, will participate in the Morgan Stanley Technology, Media & Telecom Conference.

headline: NFL Renewal Worries Spur BofA Double Downgrade of Fox Stock
summary: Bank of America Corp. double downgraded the Lachlan Murdoch-run Fox to underperform from buy on Wednesday and assigned it a $45 price target, the lowest on Wall Street.  The worry is that the traditional media company is too heavily reliant on the NFL and negotiations could slash earnings by roughly 20%.  “The NFL is by far the most valuable programming that exists today,” analysts led by Jessica Reif Ehrlich wrote.

headline: High Valuations Are Concerning: Robert Kindler
summary: Robert Kindler is one of the top M&A dealmakers in the United States with an illustrious career advising deals that included Comcast, Time Warner, Dow Chemical, Viacom and United Airlines. Kindler, global chair of M&A at Paul Weiss, joins Dani Burger on "Bloomberg Deals" to discuss the state of M&A in 2026, crypto, valuations, balance sheets and how executives approach deals.

headline: Comcast (CMCSA) Faces Downgrade from BNP Paribas as Fiber Headwinds Grow
summary: Comcast Corporation (NASDAQ:CMCSA) is included among the Goldman Sachs Dividend Stocks: Top 14 Stock Picks. On February 24, BNP Paribas analyst Sam McHugh downgraded Comcast Corporation (NASDAQ:CMCSA) to Underperform from Neutral. He also lowered the price target to $27 from $28. The analyst said Comcast looks “most exposed” to incremental fiber headwinds. He added that […]

headline: 5 Very Safe High-Yield Dividend Stocks Boomers Can Hold Forever
summary: While many Baby Boomers have enjoyed a long bull market over the past 35 years, there is a point when income becomes more critical than stock appreciation. The reason is simple: those who leave their careers to enjoy a well-deserved retirement lose the benefits of a regular salary and their jobs, such as 401(k) matching ... 5 Very Safe High-Yield Dividend Stocks Boomers Can Hold Forever

headline: Comcast Tests Quantum Routing While Expanding Digital Skills And Investor Appeal
summary: Comcast (NasdaqGS:CMCSA) is working with AMD and Classiq on a quantum algorithm network trial focused on network reliability and resilience. The company is also providing a US$50,000 digital skills grant to Detroit’s St. Patrick Senior Center to support technology training for older adults. For you as an investor, these updates touch on both sides of Comcast’s identity as a major US broadband and media provider. The quantum computing trial sits squarely in the core connectivity business,...

headline: David Ellison has a rocky history at the box office. Buying Warner Bros. could fix that
summary: Only five of Skydance's features to date — three of them starring Tom Cruise — have generated more than $200 million domestically.
